Text:
I see you shrunk this one down for resmith. I've got to see what you were able to squeeze out of it.
I know you're an audio guy. What kind of speakers do you use? Thanks Marcus.

Hi,i use PMC Fact.8 transmission line supermodel English speakers and two Bowers & Wilkins subwoofers

http://www.carltonaudiovisual.com.au/?q=node/view/1360

http://www.bowers-wilkins.com/Downloads/Product/InfoSheet/ENG_FP26948_ASW-10CM_info_sheet.pdf

There you go phase700b

I knew you'd have an awesome system!
I use some older Paradigm monitor 11's, a sub with a couple 15's built to fit under a coffee table and a Sunfire sub. It's a small cube that moves a lot of air. http://www.sunfire.com/productdetail.asp?id=8

That sunfire sub specs sounds like it does some serious bass. My  Bowers & Wilkins sound good but  i miss my  Miller & Kreisel subs!!!!
When i first left Australia in 1973 to live in Switzerland my uncle  had  a music shop i got hooked straightaway into audio never looked back that's my drug of dependence.

Yeah. I know what you mean. What I really miss is all the independent audio shops that used to be around. If I was looking for a turntable or whatever, I would spend the whole day driving around checking all the shops. That was half the fun. Those days are gone. At least around here.

Yep, everything is done online now same here a lot the shops i use to go to have closed down! 
not only that my wife has banned me from going to anymore shops!!!!
Yeah, audio equipment isn't really at the top of my wife's list either.
